data.route_analysis: Guatemala is accessible via well-connected airports, with buses and shuttles for local travel. Considerations include safety and comfort.
data.pricing_trends: Travel prices typically peak during December and January. Early booking discounts are common in the off-season.
data.seasonal_patterns: The best time to visit is between November and April, avoiding heavy rains and enjoying pleasant temperatures.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking time is 2-3 months prior to travel for the best deals.

destination_insights.route_analysis: Guatemala is accessible via well-connected airports, with buses and shuttles for local travel. Considerations include safety and comfort.
destination_insights.seasonal_patterns: The best time to visit is between November and April, avoiding heavy rains and enjoying pleasant temperatures.
destination_insights.climate: Guatemala has a tropical climate, with dry seasons ideal for exploration. Expect temperatures ranging from 60°F to 80°F during peak travel months.
destination_insights.culture: Rich in Mayan heritage, Guatemala hosts numerous festivals, ancient traditions, and vibrant local markets.
destination_insights.attractions: Must-visit sites include Tikal, Antigua, and Lake Atitlán, showcasing nature and history.

market_insights.pricing_trends: Travel prices typically peak during December and January. Early booking discounts are common in the off-season.
market_insights.booking_windows: Optimal booking time is 2-3 months prior to travel for the best deals.
market_insights.demand: Demand peaks during the dry season as tourists flock to famous sites.
market_insights.competition: Key competitors include other Central American destinations like Costa Rica and Honduras.

trend_insights.market_trends: Growing interest in eco-tourism and cultural experiences shapes market dynamics.
trend_insights.consumer_behavior: Travelers are increasingly looking for authentic experiences and sustainable options.
trend_insights.competitive_landscape: Competitors such as Costa Rica emphasize eco-friendly travel, appealing to environmentally conscious consumers.
trend_insights.seasonal_factors: Peak travel seasons significantly impact pricing and availability, especially around holidays.
